snippet.title: Super Monkey Ball Banana Rumble – SEGA Pass Trailer
snippet.description:
Six iconic characters enter the rumble as part of the SEGA PASS! Join Sonic, Tails, Knuckles, Amy, Axel and Beat all with their own unique stats and fully playable in all game modes! 

Five costumes consisting of 15 individual customization items are also included for you to deck your monkey out in costumes such as Shadow, NiGHTS, Gilius, Majima and Akira!

Super Monkey Ball Banana Rumble launches exclusively for the Nintendo Switch family of systems June 25, 2024

The SEGA Pass is included with the Digital Deluxe Edition of Banana Rumble and will also be available as a separate bundle to purchase. Individual characters and the costume bundle will also be available a la carte. All content is scheduled to be released over the coming months.

Super Monkey Ball Banana Rumble launches exclusively for the Nintendo Switch family of systems June 25, 2024. 

Sign up for SEGA emails by July 2nd, 2024 to receive the special shinobi costume and pre-order today to receive the banana suit at https://www.bananarumble.com 🐵 

Stay tuned to our official social accounts.
X - https://twitter.com/sega 
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/SEGA/ 
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/sega/ 
TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@sega_west
